comment: Has any movement in history been infiltrated and completely taken over by the Republican Party faster than the "alt-right"? It was like a toddler versus that thing from the movie ALIEN. LOL.
amr:
# ::snt Has any movement in history been infiltrated and completely taken over by the Republican Party faster than the "alt-right"? It was like a toddler versus that thing from the movie ALIEN. LOL.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (ii / infiltrate-01
                  :ARG0 (p / political-party
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Republican"
                              :op2 "Party"))
                  :ARG1 (m2 / movement-07
                        :mod (a2 / any)
                        :time (h / history)))
            :op2 (t / take-over-12
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 m2
                  :ARG1-of (c / complete-02)
                  :ARG1-of (f / fast-02
                        :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG1 t
                              :ARG3 (m3 / more)
                              :ARG4 (r / right-08
                                    :mod (a3 / alt)))))
            :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (r2 / resemble-01
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
            :ARG2 (c2 / compare-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / toddler)
                  :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                        :mod (t4 / that)
                        :source (m4 / movie
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Aliens"))))
            :ARG2-of (l / laugh-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :manner (l2 / loud))))

comment: Hi There, Please refrain from using derogatory comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thanks
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :mod (t / there)))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                        :mod (d / derogatory)))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (h2 / hurt-01
                              :ARG0 (t2 / they))
                        :op2 (r2 / reflect-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 t2
                              :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                                    :ARG2-of (v / view-02
                                          :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                                :location (h3 / here)
                                                :quant (m2 / most))))))))
      :snt3 (t4 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))
